message.msgstr: On this page, you can browse the local file and click the button to upgrade the terminal equipment software. Do not power off during upgrade or do other operations, so as not to cause damage and can not be used.
Upgrades will take time, please be patient.
Please check if the upgrade file is correct!
The space of the device isn't enough! Please reboot and try again!
Whether to restart ONU? Please login WEB network management after ONU restarting!
ONU will automatically restart. Please wait and re-login WEB network management!
On this page, you may backup several config files from device to PC as you wish after opening the ftp tool.
(You can input 1-20 characters, including alphanumeric, '_' and '.')
(You can input 0-20 characters, including alphanumeric, '_' and '.')
(You can input 1-64 characters, including alphanumeric, '_' and '.')
Please enter a valid file name!
You can download the current configuration file to the local computer.
If you enter the path of the configuration file and choose it, your terminal will be updated with the saved configuration file.
The configuration file name can only contain '_' and alphanumeric.
Please select the correct configuration file!
System is rebooting... Please wait for a moment and relogin after reboot.
